thread.title: Bill Snyder writes letter apologizing to Kansas State fans
thread.title_full: Bill Snyder writes letter apologizing to Kansas State fans

author: Matt Lombardi
title: Bill Snyder writes letter apologizing to Kansas State fans
text:
Bill Snyder writes letter apologizing to Kansas State fans College Spun 5 hrs ago Matt Lombardi © Peter G. Aiken/Getty Images Bill Snyder wrote a letter to Kansas State fans apologizing for a blowout loss. Kansas State, one week after nearly upsetting juggernaut TCU, laid an egg against Oklahoma, putting up just 110 yards of offense in a 55-0 blowout loss to the Sooners. Monday, head coach Bill Snyder penned a letter to the school’s student body apologizing for the team’s performance. He also thanked them for caring about the program.
AdChoices Bill Snyder sends message to students following 55-0 loss to OU: #KStateFB pic.twitter.com/9ScZaRZETc
— Tate Steinlage (@SteinlageT) October 19, 2015 Kansas State, now 3-3 overall, has a big game at Texas this upcoming Saturday. The Wildcats are in desperate need of a Big 12 win.
Go to MSN Home
